CodeEditorModel.Text:
'IAG Code behind - Add local subroutines for the IAG.
Public Sub OnShow Pressed = False
' Init shape If Not Init Then ' Reshape active rectangle Me.R_Active_Fill.Top = 2 Me.R_Active_Fill.Left = 2 Me.R_Active_Fill.Height = Me.R_Active_Border.Height - 4 Me.R_Active_Fill.Width = Me.R_Active_Border.Width - 4
' Reshape pressed rectangle Me.R_Pressed_Fill.Top = 2 Me.R_Pressed_Fill.Left = 2 Me.R_Pressed_Fill.Height = Me.R_Pressed_Border.Height - 4 Me.R_Pressed_Fill.Width = Me.R_Pressed_Border.Width - 4
Init = True End If
End Sub
